get_sorted_elements 
 public static Comparable[] get_sorted_elements(Hashtable table,
                                                int direction) throws Comparable. Not_comparable
Returns a sorted list of comparables for use in interface elements and other things. All elements must have implemented com.holub.tools.Comparable.
